snippet: A Jimi Hendrix biopic will use songs by the Beatles and Muddy Waters but not by Hendrix because his estate said that no film could use his music without its approval.
abstract: A Jimi Hendrix biopic will use songs by the Beatles and Muddy Waters but not by Hendrix because his estate said that no film could use his music without its approval.

headline.main: A Biopic of Hendrix, With Music by '60s Legends Not Named Hendrix
headline.print_headline: A Hendrix Biopic With No Hendrix Songs
